about_the_game:
For the strong silent type.

Play as the man himself – Luis Moncada! Including the complete model, special clothing and specific weapon. Dominate the room wherever you go and test if other players’ vests really work.

Key features:


  • Complete character model - A complete player model of Luis Moncada adaptable to all body types.
  • Voice acted actions and taunts - With a complete voice pack recorded by Luis, every action will be played out in his iconic voice. New taunts add insult to injury for those unfortunate enough to come into your sights.
  • Special clothing – With a stylish look inspired by the most popular role from Luis Moncada, you can fully immerse yourself in the character as you enforce order across the island.
  • La Hatcha Axe - Inspired by his most popular role, this weapon will ensure you make a statement when executing your rivals.

Note: The Luis Moncada character will be available at the character creation menu or at the Doctor trader under plastic surgery.

content_descriptors.notes: The game allows nudity but has an option to turn it off. It features alcohol and some drugs.
